minority_owned.long_description: A minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans.

non_minority_owned.long_description: A non-minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members not of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans.

business_create_job.short_description: Count of businesses creating new jobs
business_create_job.long_description: Count of businesses creating new jobs

job_creation_active.short_description: Count of new jobs created by active businesses
job_creation_active.long_description: Count of new jobs created by active businesses (an active business is a company that exist last year)
job_creation_active.statement: {value} new jobs have been created by active businesses in {region_name}.

job_creation_new.short_description: Count of new jobs created by new businesses
job_creation_new.long_description: Count of new jobs created by new businesses (a new business is a company newly created or has moved to the region)
job_creation_new.statement: {value} new jobs have been created by new businesses in {region_name}.

perc_job_creation_active.short_description: Job creation rate by active businesses
perc_job_creation_active.long_description: Percent of new jobs created by active businesses (an active business is a company that exist last year): \[perc_job_creation_active=\frac{job_creation_active}{all_job_creation}\]
perc_job_creation_active.statement: {value} of new jobs create by active businesses in {region_name}.

perc_job_creation_new.short_description: Job creation rate by new businesses
perc_job_creation_new.long_description: Percent of new jobs created by new businesses (a new business is a company newly created or has moved to the region): \[perc_job_creation_new=\frac{job_creation_new}{all_job_creation}\]
perc_job_creation_new.statement: {value} of new jobs create by new businesses in {region_name}.

total_job_creation.short_description: Total new jobs created by all businesses
total_job_creation.long_description: Total new jobs created by all businesses
total_job_creation.statement: {value} new jobs have been created by businesses in {region_name}.

business_job_destruction.short_description: Count of businesses industry cutting jobs
business_job_destruction.long_description: Count of businesses industry cutting jobs

job_destruction_active.short_description: Count of jobs cutted by active businesses
job_destruction_active.long_description: Count of jobs cutted by active businesses (an active business is a company that exist last year)
job_destruction_active.statement: {value} jobs have been cutted by active businesses in {region_name}.

job_destruction_exit.short_description: Count of jobs cutted by closed businesses
job_destruction_exit.long_description: Count of jobs cutted by closed businesses (a closed business is a company that stoped its activities or leaving the region)
job_destruction_exit.statement: {value} jobs have been cutted by closed businesses in {region_name}.

perc_job_destruction_active.short_description: Job destruction rate by active businesses
perc_job_destruction_active.long_description: Percent of jobs cutted by active businesses (an active business is a company that exist last year): \[perc_job_destruction_active=\frac{jobs_destroyed_active}{all_jobs_destroyed}\]
perc_job_destruction_active.statement: {value} of jobs cutted by active businesses in {region_name}.

perc_job_destruction_exit.short_description: Job destruction rate by closed businesses
perc_job_destruction_exit.long_description: Percent of jobs cutted by closed businesses (a closed business is a company that stoped its activities or leaving the region): \[perc_job_destruction_exit=\frac{jobs_destroyed_exit}{all_jobs_destroyed}\]
perc_job_destruction_exit.statement: {value} of jobs cutted by closed businesses in {region_name}.

total_job_destruction.statement: {value} jobs have been cutted by businesses in {region_name}.
